goal.en: Why do we think about philosophical questions? What is Philosophy? What are the contents of Philosophy, namely, the objects of philosophical investigation? How does Philosophy explore diverse phenomena and problems? This course aims to introduce properties and kinds of Western Philosophy in a systematic way.
goal.ch: 我們為甚麼會思考哲學問題？何謂哲學？何為哲學的內容、亦即甚麼是哲學所探討的對象？哲學如何探究各式各樣不同的現象與問題？本課程旨在從系統的分科方式來介紹哲學，目的在於從系統性的研究角度來瞭解西方哲學問題的性質與類別。

content.en:
1. Course Description;
2. Chap.1What is Philosophy?
3. Chap.3, §1-, Metaphysics (I): Philosophy’s property, beginning, and development*
4. Chap.2, §1-3, Epistemology (I): Descartes, Leibniz, and Rationalism
5. Chap.2, §4-, Epistemology (II): Hume and Empiricism, Kant’s critical Philosophy
6. Chap.3, §2-4, Philosophy of Mind: Hobbes’s materialism, Free will and Determinism, Mind-body problem
7. Chap.4, §1-6, Philosophy of science：Bacon, Kuhn and theories of philosophy of science
8. Chap.5, §1-3, Ethics (I): Kant’s Deontology
9. Midterm exam
10. Chap.5, §4-6, Ethics (II): Utilitarianism, Virtue Ethics
11. Chap.5, §7-10, Application, Applied Ethics: Ethics of Medicine
12. Chap.6, §1-2, Social Philosophy: Mill and Liberalism, Marx’s Socialism
13. Chap.6, §3-5, Political Philosophy: Rousseau and Social Contract, Plural theory of State
14. Chap.7, §1-2, Philosophy of Art (I): Plato and Aristotle
15. Chap.7, §3-4, Philosophy of Art (II): Tolstoy, Marcuse
16., Chap.8, §1-3, Philosophy of Religion (I): Possibility of speaking about religion, Proofs of God’s Existence
17. Chap.8, §4-6, Philosophy of Religion (II): Problems of Evil and Kierkegaard’s encounter with Faith
18. Final exam
content.ch:
週次 課程進度與內容
1. 課程說明及分組
2. Chap.1何謂哲學？
3. Chap.3 形上學：哲學的性質、萌芽與發展
4. Chap.2, §1-3, 知識論(I)：笛卡兒、萊布尼茲與理性主義
5. Chap.2, §4-6, 知識論(II)：休謨與經驗主義、康德的批判哲學
6. Chap.3, §2-4, 心靈哲學：霍布斯唯物論、自由意志與決定論、心物問題
7. Chap.4 科學哲學：培根、孔恩、科學哲學理論
8. Chap.5, §1-3, 倫理學(I)：康德之義務論
9. 期中考
10. Chap.5, §4-6,倫理學(II)：效益主義、德行倫理學、女性主義倫理學
11. Chap.5, §7-10, 應用倫理學：醫療倫理學
12. Chap.6, §1-2, 社會哲學：彌爾與自由主義、馬克思的社會主義
13. Chap.6, §3-5, 政治哲學：盧梭與社會契約論、多元主義國家論
14. Chap.7, §1-2, 藝術哲學(I)：柏拉圖、亞里斯多德
15. Chap.7, §3-4, 藝術哲學(II)：托爾斯泰、馬庫色
16. Chap.8, §1-3, 宗教哲學(I)：言談宗教之可能性、上帝存在的證明
17. Chap.8, §4-6, 宗教哲學(II)：多瑪斯與安瑟倫的上帝證明、惡的難題
18. 期末考試
